vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (0x941d225236464a25eb18076df7da6a91d0f95e9e.sol#31-43):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0x941d225236464a25eb18076df7da6a91d0f95e9e.sol#37-41)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (0x941d225236464a25eb18076df7da6a91d0f95e9e.sol#39)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
